summary: An ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 23442 entitled: "An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 52, A. A. Denny's Addition to the City of Seattle, all in the City of Seattle, being the alley from Seneca Street to Spring Street and between 7th Avenue and 8th Avenue, by paving the same with vitrified brick laid upon a proper concrete foundation, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, all in accordance with Resolution No. 2602 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle" approved March 1, 1910.
